node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We’re back from holiday celebrations and ready to tackle the new year. Over the holiday, Jon got the comment “The purple thing is weird.” in regards to our logo color / sticker color. The color is not purple! It’s very specifically lilac. Stan reveals the lilac…
